name: pnpm_workspace_poc
description: A minimal starter repository for setting up a monorepo using pnpm workspace.

scripts.dev: pnpm run build:packages && concurrently --pad-prefix --names "Packages,Apps" -c "bgGreen,bgBlue" "pnpm run dev:packages" "pnpm --parallel --filter './apps/*' run dev"
scripts.build:frontend: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.dev:frontend: pnpm run build:packages && concurrently --pad-prefix --names "Packages,Frontend" -c "bgGreen,bgBlue" "pnpm run dev:packages" "pnpm --filter frontend dev"
scripts.build:backend: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter backend build
scripts.dev:backend: pnpm run build:packages && concurrently --pad-prefix --names "Packages,Backend" -c "bgGreen,bgBlue" "pnpm run dev:packages" "pnpm --filter backend dev"

author: Ayaan Shaikh
